attributes.action: Granting permanent residency, citizenships to refugees and people availing public benefits
attributes.additional_details: The government must review the system where they granted permanent residency to asylum seekers from 2001. The people are exploiting the system as they are gaining benefits getting access through the EEA countries. The people who come on this basis are claiming the benefits at the cost of the Tax Payers expense. They should contribute to be citizens. the asylum seekers must be sent back to their country of origin. Those convicted of crimes should be deported back to their home country with stripping of their naturalised stay in this country. We need a SAFE and friendly UK
